attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recently it has come to my attention that for some unknown reason there seems to be a vast shortage in the number of £5 notes that are currently in circulation. I have a Saturday job in retail and working for a retailer is highly impractical when your perfomance as a sales assisstant is directly inhibited by a lack of suitable tender. Customers are often incensed and irate when we are unable to provide them with £5 notes in their change and can only offer them large amounts of heavy coins instead. I urge the relevant government body to issue more £5 notes or make them more widely available in order to combat this situation.

Alex Sarnowski (Student)
